FuncDef: This command configures the multi-homing mode for the Ethernet-Segment assingle-activeor all-active multi-homing, as defined in RFC7432.

ParaDef.Info: Configures single-active mode for the Ethernet-Segment.
Configures the system to not send an esi-label for single-active mode.
Configures single-active mode for the Ethernet-Segment.
